p: Currently, arthropods are the best represented phylum (median 8.7% of species’ range represented), and molluscs the least (median 6.1%; Fig. 2; Supplementary Table 2). Of the Chordates, ray-finned fishes (Actinopterygii) are the best represented (median 6.8%), and birds the least (median 3.6%), closely followed by mammals (median 3.7%).
